required.phone: A valid phone number is required.
required.registeredCapitalInYuan: Registered capital in yuan is required.

minLength.firstName: First name must be at least 2 characters long.
minLength.lastName: Last name must be at least 2 characters long.
minLength.jobTitle: Job title must be at least 2 characters long.
minLength.businessType: Business type should have at least 3 characters.
minLength.taxIdentificationNumber: Tax ID should have at least 8 characters.
minLength.companyName: Company name should have at least 2 characters.
minLength.country: Country code should have exactly 2 characters.

maxLength.businessType: Business type should not exceed 50 characters.
maxLength.taxIdentificationNumber: Tax ID should not exceed 15 characters.
maxLength.companyName: Company name should not exceed 100 characters.

maxLength.registrationNumber: Registration number should not exceed 20 characters.

pattern.phone: Phone number must be 10 to 15 digits long and may start with a +.
pattern.taxIdentificationNumber: Tax ID must be in valid format
pattern.country: Please enter a valid country code.

type.dateOfBirth: Date of birth must be a string.
type.numberOfEmployees: Number of employees must be a number.

minimum.numberOfEmployees: Number of employees must be at least 1.
